title: Lucas Petherbridge | Software Engineer Resume
description: Software Engineer Resume for Lucas Petherbridge

header.name: Lucas Petherbridge
header.summary: Passionate & driven polyglot software engineer with 12+ years experience designing innovative solutions using the latest software technologies and practices. Constantly seeking to expand and grow using modern technologies to create innovative solutions. Great communicator team collaborator, and mentor willing to take on any challenge.

bullets: Developed full-stack web applications to manage and accelerate studio pipeline tasks and assets using React/Typescfript, Python, and Rust.
Built generative form building and grid-view protoypes for integration with business intelligence systems using SolidJS and Python

positions.title: Principal Software Engineer

Drafted an interoperability & portability specification for heterogeneous EMSO containerized applications using YAML & Google Protocol Buffers.
Developed a container runtime system simulator for RF applications integrating with Software Defined Radios

positions.title: Principal Software Engineer

Led architecture initiatives for 7 teams, doubling website performance using LighthouseCI & PageSpeed Insights by migrating to NextJS.
